amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to be used to enforce Executive Order 13166, which directs Federal agencies to provide foreign-language services to anyone who may seek to engage with the American Government.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to enforce Executive Order 13166, with regards to providing translation and interpretaion services to those limited in their English proficiency.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A032) Agreed to by recorded vote: 224 - 189 (Roll no. 362).
